sections.heading: 06|Mortgagor and mortgagee mediation
sections.text: Effective:September 11, 2008Latest Legislation:House Bill 138 - 127th General AssemblyPDF:Download Authenticated PDFIn an action for the foreclosure of a mortgage, the court may at any stage in the action require the mortgagor and the mortgagee to participate i

sections.heading: the Revised Code do not require administrators or executors to give security for costs in any suit commenced or prosecuted by them in the county in which they have been appointed or qualified, and in which they have given bond as such
sections.text: the Revised Code do not require administrators or executors to give security for costs in any suit commenced or prosecuted by them in the county in which they have been appointed or qualified, and in which they have given bond as such.
